text: Cazoi kasone, ki ʙo Xudo va pajomʙaronas cang mekunand va dar zamin ʙa fasod mekusand, on ast, ki kusta savand jo ʙar dor gardand jo dasthovu pohojason jake az capu jake az rost ʙurida savad jo az sarzamini xud ʙadarƣa savand. Inho rasvoijason dar in cahon ast va dar oxirat niz ʙa azoʙe ʙuzurg giriftor ojand
